messages.subject: Jon Stewart's commencement address
messages.msgSnippet: The commencement speech (by Jon Stewart to thes tudents of William and Mary College in VA). But the unfortunate, yet truly exciting thing about your life, is
messages.messageBody:
The commencement speech (by Jon Stewart to thes tudents of William and
Mary College in VA).

"But the unfortunate, yet truly exciting thing about your life, is that
there is no core curriculum. The entire place is an elective. The paths
are infinite and the results uncertain. College is something you
complete. Life is something you experience. So donâ€™t worry about your
grade, or the results or success. Success is defined in myriad ways,
and you will find it, and people will no longer be grading you.

"Love what you do. Get good at it. Competence is a rare commodity in
this day and age."


He's describing unschooling. <g>



~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
